name: SMASH tennis booking
overview:
BOOK YOUR COURT, FIND PLAYERS AND COACHES IN ONE PLACE. SMASH IS THE NEXT BOOKING.COM FOR TENNIS AVAILABLE ON WEB AND MOBILE APP.

PRODUCT

Mobile tennis courts’ booking system. Search, book and play at the most convenient court. Find a coach and tennis partner to play with. All at one place. We create app and web solution to solve wasted time, free court and tennis partner research problem.

Competition: > Local booking systems
> Court locating systems - playtennis.com; 15love.ch; reservemycourt.com > Tennis information portals - playtennis.com; 15love.ch; reservemycourt.com > Player scheduling systems - playtennis.com;

MARKET

We have already launched BETA version. We already have 35% agreements of Lithuanian tennis courts’ market.

3 main groups of customers – tennis courts, tennis players, tennis coaches. We will reach our market together with strong strategic partners.

NL - 1 000 000 players / 6900 courts. UK - 4 519 000 players / 23 000 courts. SPAIN - 4 758 000 players / 55 000 courts. SWEDEN - 500 000 players / 4300 courts. USA - 35 000 000 players / 270 000 courts.

TEAM AND PARTNERSHIP

Together with strong and experienced team from different business background (IT, marketing, sales, finance) we create unified tennis courts’ booking system.

All co-founders play tennis. We are passionate about it. We know this market from the inside. We already have strong strategic partners - BMW, WILSON, SEB bank, MICROSOFT, VERSLO ŽINIOS (largest business paper in Lithuania), LTS (Lithuanian Tennis association).

Starting from Lithuania with 300 tennis courts and around 5000 tennis players we immediately scale to foreign markets first one is The Netherlands.

At the moment there are 4 shareholders: Gabriele Anusauskaite (sales, public relations), Marius Padvilikis (finance, IT), Ruta Bylaityte (sales, human resource), Roman Drokov (IT, marketing).

  • Back-end (Konstantin Rykov) and Front-end (Petras Slekys) developers.
